entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Okotoks

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 17. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
